meanings.definition: Wushus (noun): plural form of wushu, a Chinese martial art
meanings.sent1: The students practiced their wushus diligently in the martial arts class.
meanings.sent2: The wushus they performed were graceful and powerful.
meanings.sent3: During the competition, their wushus impressed the judges with their skill.
meanings.sent4: Her wushus were like a dance, blending strength and elegance.
meanings.sent5: The wushus of the master were a sight to behold, inspiring awe in all who watched.

meanings.definition: Wushus (adjective): relating to or characteristic of wushu
meanings.sent1: The wushus techniques they learned were traditional and effective.
meanings.sent2: She admired the wushus movements of the skilled martial artist.
meanings.sent3: His wushus outfit was colorful and eye-catching, standing out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The wushus spirit of discipline and focus guided their training.
meanings.sent5: The wushus style of fighting was both beautiful and formidable, a true display of mastery.
